section2.title: Nau mai ki Kiwi Explorer
section2.subtitle: Tō Kuaha ki te Aotearoa Tūturu. He tohunga mātou ki te waihanga haerenga hōhonu atu i ngā ara tūruhi noa. Tūhurahia te ataahua whakaharahara o Aotearoa, mai i ngā takutai taratara ki ngā ngahere tāwāhi, me ō mātou kaiārahi ā-rohe mātanga.

topic1.title: Tūhurahia a Aotearoa i runga i te āhua hou
topic1.content: Kimihia ngā wāhi huna, ngā wāhi me toro, me ngā tino wāhi e manakohia ana e te iwi o Aotearoa.

topic2.title: Tō Aratohu Haerenga Matua ki Aotearoa
topic2.content: Rapua ngā wāhi whakamīharo, ngā tohutohu haerenga, me ngā taunakitanga ā-roto—katoa kei konei!

topic3.title: Tīmatahia tō Haerenga Kiwi i te Rā Nei
topic3.content: Whakaritea, tūhurahia, me te wheako i ngā mea pai rawa atu o Aotearoa me Kiwi Explorer.

heroContent.title: Tūhurahia ngā Mīharo o Aotearoa
heroContent.subtitle: Kei a Kiwi Explorer he whānuitanga o ngā haerenga kua whakaritea kia hāngai ki ō hiahia. Tirohia ā mātou wheako, whakapā mai rānei kia waihangatia tō haerenga Kiwi whaiaro. Mā mātou koe e ārahi i runga i te haerenga kāore e warewaretia.

city.title: Ngā Tāone Motuhake
city.subtitle: Tūhuratia ngā tāone o Aotearoa, mai i ngā pokapū pīkaunga nui ki ngā wāhi ataahua o te rohe.

restaurant.title: Ngā Wharekai Motuhake
restaurant.subtitle: Waihanga i tō wheako kai i Aotearoa mā ā mātou whiringa wharekai motuhake.

activity.title: Ngā Mahi Motuhake
activity.subtitle: Ngā wāhi me ngā wheako tūruhi e rongonui ai a Aotearoa puta noa i te ao.

footer.subtitle: Ka tuku a Kiwi Explorer i ngā haerenga kua whakaritea kia hāngai ki ō hiahia. Tirohia ā mātou wheako, whakapā mai rānei kia waihangatia tō haerenga Kiwi whaiaro.
